Package me.archdukeliamus.dygenerate.rtutils

package me.archdukeliamus.dygenerate.rtutils
The me.archdukeliamus.dygenerate.rtutils package contains various bootstrap methods and call site implementations for potentially common uses of invokedynamic, such as unusual dispatching strategies or analogues of behavior in other language runtimes.
Use of classes in this package requires Dygenerate to be present at runtime.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    me.archdukeliamus.dygenerate
    The me.archdukeliamus.dygenerate package describes the Dygenerate utility for inserting invokedynamic (indy) and dynamic constant (condy) ldc opcodes into Java (or any other JVM language) source code.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bootstraps
    Contains various utility bootstrap methods.
    DuckTypeCallSite
    A polymorphic inline caching call site that calls a provided method on any object if it exists, otherwise throws NoSuchMethodError for that invocation.
